column1: Relatives and friends are invited to call at the family owned and operated MCCULLY-POLYNIAK FUNERAL HOME
column2: P.A. 237 East Patapsco Avenue (BROOKLYN) on Wednesday 3 to 5 and 7 to 9 PM. A funeral Mass will be celebrated in the Our Lady of Good Councel Church 1532 East Fort Avenue on Thursay at 9AM. Interment Parkwood Cemetery.
